Package <Unnamed>

Interface Summary
CPU A CPU object records the currently executing process, the number of context switches that have occurred during execution, and provides for simulated execution of processes.
InterruptHandler Interface for kernel component that handles interrupts representing kernel events such as timeouts and completion of device I/O operations.
IODevice Representation of an I/O device and queue.
Kernel Interface to the simulated kernel.
ProcessControlBlock Abstract Description of Process Control Block used by kernel and simulator.
SystemCall System call interface for OS kernel.
SystemTimer A SystemTimer (i) provides support for simulated time, and (ii) support for the setting of timeout interrupts by kernel code.
 

Class Summary
CPUInstruction Abstract representation of a block of program code describing a cpu burst.
Event Abstract class Event - write a description of the class here
EventQueue Ordered Event queue for discrete event simulator.
ExecveEvent An Execve event represents the creation of a program execution.
Instruction Abstract representation of program instruction.
IOInstruction Abstract representation of a block of program code describing an I/O burst.
TimeOutEvent A timeout event is used to flag the end of the current execution time slice.
WakeUpEvent A WakeUp event occurs when an I/O operation completes.
 

Enum Summary
ProcessControlBlock.State Possible process states.
